pages.text: Lyrarapax is a small radiodont from the early Cambrian which hunted using its small frontal appendages. These frontal appendages had a similar function to the front antennae of velvet worms.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw Fish$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Fish$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
